title: Logical and physical access controls
description: Systems enforce access controls and separation of duties.
remediation: Document and implement RBAC/IDM controls; restrict administrative access.

title: Encryption and key management
description: Data is protected with encryption and keys are managed securely.
remediation: Adopt a key management service and ensure encryption at rest and in transit.

title: Change management
description: Changes to systems are tracked, reviewed, and approved.
remediation: Add change control policies, enforce PR reviews and documented approvals.
